net.bytebuddy.matcher

类 StringMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.matcher.ElementMatcher.Junction.AbstractBase<String>
      • net.bytebuddy.matcher.StringMatcher
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ElementMatcher<String>, ElementMatcher.Junction<String>

    public class StringMatcher
extends ElementMatcher.Junction.AbstractBase<String>
    An element matcher that compares two strings by a given pattern which is characterized by a StringMatcher.Mode.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  StringMatcher.Mode
      Defines the mode a StringMatcher compares to strings with.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • StringMatcher

        public StringMatcher(String value,
                     StringMatcher.Mode mode)
        Creates a new string matcher.
        参数:
        value - The value that is the base of the matching.
        mode - The mode to apply for matching the given value against the matcher's input

    • 方法详细资料

      • matches

        public boolean matches(String target)
        从接口复制的说明: ElementMatcher
        Matches a target against this element matcher.
        参数:
        target - The instance to be matched.
        返回:
        true if the given element is matched by this matcher or false otherwise.
